name: Integrated Access Solutions
description:
Integrated Access Solutions (IAS) provides full-service unified communications and contact center solutions. When communication are critical—when every single call, message, mention, and collaboration is important—IAS will consult on, architect, implement, and manage all of your communication needs.
 
By helping you leverage all possible communication channels—including voice, email, chat, video, social, interactive voice response, and web—IAS solutions bridge communication silos and deliver efficient and effective means of interaction and real-time collaboration among all players. Whether you’re talking with customers, partners, vendors, or members of your distributed workforce, everyone who needs to communicate can do so, regardless of their physical location, via whatever channel they want to use.
 
The seasoned professionals at IAS have nearly 60 collective years of experience investigating, studying, and working with communications technology. We know what works, and we’ve hand-selected a diverse portfolio of exemplary products that we use to tailor our solutions to each unique customer organization. We’re small enough to be nimble, big enough to have every resource available, and experienced enough to have gray hair and scar tissue from thousands of deployments. We put our resources and experience on the line to ensure communication remains a strategic advantage for your business.
